channel.title: Donations
channel.description:
I do appeciate that you release your mod for free, but i think you really should have an optional and [u]reasonably[/u] big "Donate" button on the download page of the mod when it is released. Also a small link on the bottom of pages wouldn't hurt?
You could use the money to set up a trust fund in order to encourage others in makeing free, high quality, long term projects like BMS. Or just to maintain servercosts. I don't really care what you use it for, I WILL DONATE as in appreciaton of your dedication. :slight_smile: Even if it goes towards a beer for the devs. :rolleyes:

item.title: Donations
item.dc:creator: qwert33
item.description:
I do appeciate that you release your mod for free, but i think you really should have an optional and reasonably big “Donate” button on the download page of the mod when it is released. Also a small link on the bottom of pages wouldn’t hurt?
